author: jochembrouwer
content:
Hey all, how do I fill the Verkle tests with Geth? I am on EEST `verkle/main` branch and for geth I am using this: https://github.com/gballet/go-ethereum 

If I `uv run fill --fork Verkle tests/verkle/eip4762_verkle_gas_witness -k "test_extcodehash[fork_Verkle-blockchain_test_engine-system_contract]" --evm-bin ~/Documents/ejs/clients/go-ethereum/build/bin/evm` I then get: 

```
================================================================================================== FAILURES ==================================================================================================
____________________________________________________________________ test_extcodehash[fork_Verkle-blockchain_test_engine-system_contract] ____________________________________________________________________
tests/verkle/eip4762_verkle_gas_witness/test_extcodehash.py:75: in test_extcodehash
    _extcodehash(blockchain_test, target, witness_check_extra)
tests/verkle/eip4762_verkle_gas_witness/test_extcodehash.py:174: in _extcodehash
    blockchain_test(
src/pytest_plugins/filler/filler.py:805: in __init__
    fixture = self.generate(
src/ethereum_test_specs/blockchain.py:1059: in generate
    return self.make_hive_fixture(t8n, fork, eips)
src/ethereum_test_specs/blockchain.py:969: in make_hive_fixture
    self.generate_block_data(
src/ethereum_test_specs/blockchain.py:536: in generate_block_data
    raise e
src/ethereum_test_specs/blockchain.py:495: in generate_block_data
    raise Exception(
E   Exception: no state diff in transition tool output, cannot verify witness
```
